---

>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/context/{id}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Permanently removes a context from the workspace. This operation cannot be undone and will affect config resolution.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

>
  
</ParamsDetails>
